title: Create personalized prompt templates
description:
Design and implement prompt templates that naturally incorporate the child's name for an engaging experience.

## Prompt Categories

### Activity Instructions
- 'Let's count together, {name}!'
- 'Can you find the right letter, {name}?'
- 'Tap each letter to hear its sound, {name}!'
- 'Which number shows this many, {name}?'

### Encouragement (Correct Answer)
- 'Great job, {name}!'
- 'You're amazing, {name}!'
- 'Wonderful, {name}! You got it!'
- 'That's right, {name}!'

### Gentle Correction
- 'Let's try again, {name}'
- 'Almost! Listen carefully, {name}'
- 'Not quite, {name}. The answer is...'

### Lesson Progress
- 'You're doing great, {name}!'
- 'One more to go, {name}!'
- 'Lesson complete! Amazing work, {name}!'

- Randomize within categories for variety
- Support string interpolation for child name

title: Create ElevenLabsService API client

- Async/await API for generating speech from text

title: Handle TTS error states and fallbacks
description:
Implement robust error handling for TTS failures with graceful fallbacks.

## Error Scenarios
- No API key configured → Use system TTS
- Network unavailable → Use cached audio or system TTS
- API rate limited → Queue and retry, fallback to system
- Invalid API key → Show parent notification, use system TTS
- Audio generation failed → Fallback to system TTS

## User Experience
- Never block UI waiting for audio
- Show subtle indicator if using fallback voice
- Queue audio requests (don't overlap)
- Cancel pending audio on navigation

## Parent Notifications
- Alert if API key invalid (in settings)
- Usage warnings approaching limits (if API provides)

## File Locations
- ElevenLabsService.swift (error types)
- SoundManager.swift (fallback logic)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] App never crashes on TTS failure
- [ ] Fallback to system TTS works seamlessly
- [ ] Audio queue prevents overlap
- [ ] Parents notified of configuration issues

title: [EPIC] ElevenLabs TTS Integration: Personalized Audio Experience
description:
Integrate ElevenLabs text-to-speech to create a personalized, interactive learning experience. The app will read questions aloud, use the child's name for encouragement, and provide natural-sounding voice guidance throughout activities.

## Goals
- Replace basic AVSpeechSynthesizer with natural ElevenLabs voices
- Read activity questions and instructions aloud
- Personalize prompts with the child's name (e.g., 'Great job, Emma!')
- Cache audio to minimize API calls and improve responsiveness
- Allow parents to configure voice preferences

## Architecture
- ElevenLabsService: API client for TTS generation
- AudioCacheManager: Local storage for generated audio
- Extended SoundManager: Unified interface for all audio
- Parent Settings: API key and voice configuration

## Success Criteria
- All activity instructions can be read aloud
- Child's name is used naturally in encouragement
- Audio plays immediately (cached) for common phrases
- Graceful fallback to system TTS if API unavailable
